source.query:
select {[Measures].[0D_NW_NETV], [Measures].[0D_NW_OORV]} on columns,
   [0D_NW_CNTRY].[LEVEL01] on rows
from [$0D_NW_C01]

activities.name: CopyFromSAPTable
activities.description: Copy incremental data from SAP table to AzureBlobStorage

activities.name: LookupLastCopiedDate
activities.description: Copy incremental data from SAP table to AzureBlobStorage

activities.name: SetLastCopiedDate
activities.description: Store the last copied date into blob by calling Logic App

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from persons

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from persons where LastModifytime > '@{activity('LookupOldWatermarkActivity').output.firstrow.watermarkvalue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}';

properties.description: Get Product Deltas based on LastModified dates
Get Product Deltas based on LastModified dates
Usage of Parquet format in Sink
Connection to your data destination store.
Blob to store the max copied request ID from SAP BW Open Hub table as high watermark
SAP BW Open Hub table source
Azure Data Factory runtime - SAP Connector

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		PaymentDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		Value as decimal(15,2) '000,000,000.000',
		Currency as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd']) ~> PaymentsAzDL
PaymentsAzDL sink(input(
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		PaymentDate as date,
		PaymentValue as decimal(15,2),
		Currency as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		PaymentNr,
		SalesOrderNr,
		CustomerNr,
		CustomerName,
		PaymentDate,
		PaymentValue = Value,
		Currency
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SynapePayments

source(output(
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		PaymentDate as string,
		Value as string,
		Currency as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'document') ~> PaymentDataCosmosDB
PaymentDataCosmosDB derive(PaymentDateD = toDate(PaymentDate , 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		ValueD = toDecimal(Value, 15, 2)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		PaymentDate as date,
		PaymentValue as decimal(15,2),
		Currency as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		PaymentNr,
		SalesOrderNr,
		CustomerNr,
		CustomerName,
		PaymentDate = PaymentDateD,
		PaymentValue = ValueD,
		Currency
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PaymentDateSynapse

VBAKDL, VBAPDL join(VBAKDL@VBELN == VBAPDL@VBELN,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SalesData
SalesData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MergedSalesData
